s3-get-object.description: An Amazon S3 trigger that retrieves metadata for the object that has been updated.

dynamodb-process-stream.description: An Amazon DynamoDB trigger that logs the updates made to a table.

stream-request-handler.description: A Stream Request Handler that capitalizes the input stream. See Stream Request Handler for more information.

sns-message.description: An Amazon SNS trigger that logs the message pushed to the SNS topic.

kinesis-process-record.description: An Amazon Kinesis stream processor that logs the data being published.

cognito-sync-trigger.description: An Amazon Cognito Sync trigger that modifies Cognito datasets based on the incoming event.
